alert.note: Alert for West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Cameron Parish, Jefferson and central Orange Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Orangefield to near Hamshire. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, Nome, Hamshire, Central Gardens, Sabine Pass, China, Rose City, Port Acres, Orangefield, Fannett, La Belle, Southeast Texas Regional Airport and Winnie. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 873 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
